channel.title: Argh
channel.description:
I can't find any working guide on the internet how to make a moparscape server, i've tried many but it doesn't work, only i can get into the server and when i try to register it it says that the server is offline, i got a NetGear router and in many guides they say how to do with netgear but in my router menu it doesnt have the same options that is in the guides, can someone help me?
Btw, when ive downloaded a server source do i have to set an IP in the folder or something?
And when i click run server it says something about Java, but i got the latest java.

item.title: Argh
item.dc:creator: @war4pk war4pk
item.description:
@war4pk wrote:

[quote=“pk0r, post:20, topic:286453”]you need to change the destination of ur jdk 6 in ur run file[/quote]How do i change it? the text is

@echo off
color 0a
title Demolishscape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

How do i change the destination?

I don’t think i can get a PS to work, due to my stupid router. My bro doesnt use the same network as me…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 10:53:55 am[/size][hr]BUMP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 11:15:12 am[/size][hr]BUMPBUMPELIBUMPBUMP

Read full topic

item.title: Argh
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“war4pk, post:15, topic:286453”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=378830.msg2849401#msg2849401 date=1246459337]

[quote author=war4pk link=topic=378830.msg2849394#msg2849394 date=1246459241]

It cannot find the server class. It may be placed in a different directory than it has been referenced to.

[/quote]Well, what can i do to fix that?

Move the server class to the directory specified.
[/quote]More detailed? :o[/quote]

Just switch sources, you’re not gonna get it.

Read full topic
